name: Bulwark
description:
Bulwark - A form of defence, often a wall.

Bulwark is a tower defence game set in the not too distant future. Place towers strategically to defend your base and defeat your enemies.

Features:

*20 unique levels each with secondary objectives for increased re-playability.
*4 distinct level themes (Grasslands, Ice/Snow, Industrial, Space)
*A mix of towers designed for strategy.
*24 achievements to unlock.
*A variety of challenging enemies.

It is your responsibility to be the last stand against the enemy. Do not let them pass, protect the base at all costs!
